Company: Colorado Mental Health Institute Fort Logan
Description of incident: A briefcase with paper files was taken from an employee's car while it was at a park on April 21.  The briefcase contained paper files with the information of 40 employees and 247 patients.  Only 29 employees and 40 patients had their Social Security numbers exposed.  Other information included names, addresses, gender and birth dates.  Those affected were notified in early June.
